channel.title: math.OA updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.OA updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Rigidity of Higson coronas
item.description: arXiv:2502.10073v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We show that under mild set theoretic hypotheses we have rigidity for algebras of continuous functions over Higson coronas, topological spaces arising in coarse geometry. In particular, we show that under $\mathsf{OCA}$ and $\mathsf {MA}_{\aleph_1}$, if two uniformly locally finite metric spaces $X$ and $Y$ have homeomorphic Higson coronas $\nu X$ and $\nu Y$, then $X$ and $Y$ are coarsely equivalent, a statement which provably does not follow from $\mathsf{ZFC}$ alone.
item.dc:creator: Alessandro Vignati

item.title: A Finite Dimensional Counterexample for Arveson's Hyperrigidity Conjecture
item.description: arXiv:2502.10286v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We construct an operator system generated by $4$ operators that is not hyperrigid, although all restrictions of irreducible representations have the unique extension property.
item.dc:creator: Marcel Scherer

item.title: $B$-valued semi-circular system and the free Poincar\'{e} inequality
item.description: arXiv:2409.16498v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We characterize $B$-valued semi-circular system in terms of $B$-valued free probabilistic analogue of Poincar\'{e} inequality. This is a $B$-valued generalization of Biane's theorem \cite[Theorem 5.1]{b03}. Moreover, we prove that Voiculescu's conjecture on $B$-valued free Poincar\'{e} inequality in \cite{aim06} is not in the affirmative as it is.
item.dc:creator: Hyuga Ito
